tweet.text: On July 23, 1971, Henry Kissinger and Japanese Ambassador Ushiba discussed the state of U.S.-Japanese relations a week after Kissinger’s secret trip to #China. Read more: https://t.co/EbtOf7MU70 #FRUS https://t.co/8fAe27t6S8
